titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: YEAR AND MONTH OF BIRTH (BABY) - Description

div.p: YEAR AND MONTH OF BIRTH (BABY) is the year and month of the recorded PERSON BIRTH DATE (BABY) of a baby.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, YEAR AND MONTH OF BIRTH (BABY) is submitted instead of DATE TIME OF BIRTH (BABY), where the data set record is anonymised.
